Publications

Photo by Thomas Kelley on Unsplash


Here is a list of the main publications from me and the lab. For a more detailed list, please check my Google scholar

Calviello L, Hirsekorn A, Ohler U. Quantifcation of translation uncovers the functions of the alternative transcriptome , Nature Structural & Molecular Biology, 2020

Integrated proteogenomic deep sequencing and analytics accurately identify non-canonical peptides in tumor immunopeptidomes , Nature Communications, 2020

The Translational Landscape of the Human Heart Cell, 2019

Calviello L, Sydow D, Harnett D, Ohler U. Ribo-seQC: comprehensive analysis of cytoplasmic and organellar ribosome profiling data , bioRxiv, 2019

RNA localization is a key determinant of neurite-enriched proteome , Nature Communications, 2017

Calviello L, Ohler U. Beyond Read-Counts: Ribo-seq Data Analysis to Understand the Functions of the Transcriptome , Trends in Genetics, 2017

Mukherjee N, Calviello L, Hirsekorn A, de Pretis S, Pelizzola M, Ohler U. Integrative classification of human coding and noncoding genes through RNA metabolism profiles , Nature Structural & Molecular Biology, 2016 

Hsu PY, Calviello L, Larry Wu HY, Li FW, Rothfels CJ, Ohler U, Benfey PN. Super-resolution ribosome profiling reveals unannotated translation events in Arabidopsis , PNAS, 2016

Calviello L, Mukherjee N, Wyler E, Zauber H, Hirsekorn A, Selbach M, Landthaler M, Obermayer B, Ohler U. Detecting actively translated open reading frames in ribosome profiling data , Nature Methods, 2015

Mackoviak S, Zauber H, Bielow C, Thiel D, Kutz K, Calviello L, Mastrobuoni G, Rajewsky N, Kempa S, Selbach M, Obermayer B. Extensive identification and analysis of conserved small ORFs in animals , Genome Biology, 2014

Calviello L, Stano P, Mavelli F, Luisi PL, Marangoni M. Quasi-cellular systems: stochastic simulation analysis at nanoscale range , BMC Bioinformatics, 2013
